news.title: Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row
news.summary: Customers' photos and documents stored online will no longer be protected by end-to-end encryption.

news.title: Coinbase boss claims SEC will drop crypto lawsuit
news.summary: The SEC's 2023 lawsuit formed part of a crackdown on crypto firms which President Trump pledged to reverse.

news.title: What does Jack Ma's return to the spotlight mean?
news.summary: Analysts say the Alibaba founder's re-emergence could signal a policy change in Beijing.

news.title: Children routinely using social media, Australian regulator says
news.summary: It found they were easily able to bypass age checks on apps, which face being banned for under-16s.

news.title: AI cracks superbug problem in two days that took scientists years
news.summary: The lead researcher has told the BBC he was so astounded he assumed his computer had been hacked.
